mapper.select: SELECT reply_id AS replyId, comment_id AS commentId, writer_id AS writerId, content, likes, register_date AS registerDate, modify_date AS modifyDate FROM reply
SELECT reply_id AS replyId, comment_id AS commentId, writer_id AS writerId, content, likes, register_date AS registerDate, modify_date AS modifyDate FROM reply WHERE comment_id=#{commentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(comment_id, writer_id, content, register_date ) VALUES (#{commentId},#{writerId},#{content}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET content=#{content}, modify_date=NOW() WHERE reply_id=#{replyId}
